casebody.data:
Salomon, Respondent, v. Manhattan Ry. Co. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. March 2, 1891.) Appeal from equity term. Action by Abraham Salomon against the Manhattan Railway Company and another. From a judgment for plaintiff, defendants appeal.

*958Argued before Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Leo O. Dessar, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment appealed from affirmed, with costs.
